import React, {useState} from 'react' import ProfileChart from '../layout/profile-chart' function IndexChart() { const [selectedChart, setSelectedChart] = useState("BTC") const [chartList, setChartList] = useState([ ["BTC", "بیت کوین"], ["ETH", "اتریوم"], ["LTC", "لایت کوین"] ]) return ( <>
{chartList.map((item, idx)=>{ return
setSelectedChart("BTC")}>
{item[1]} {item[0]}
{/* */}
}) }
) } export default IndexChart
